title: 3rd SEM CSE ISA
content:
Any tips how to prepare for ISA'S for CSE ......brief idea about each subject how to prepare .....Should we focus more in slides or notes or any other sources.

Thanks in Advance.

comments.body: Slides should be more than enough . There might be some previous year papers on pesu library go through them if you find them . Remember do not take 2ISA system as lightly as you took 5ISA( many just studied on the day of the day of the exam and managed to get 15+ ik) . 2ISA will be a lot harder and if you mess up one ISA it can easily tank your grade significantly.
